items.caption: More of what you love for your skin—redox signaling molecules in our most concentrated formula.
Why redox cell signaling? It rejuvenates and regenerates skin for a more vibrant and youthful look.
Our simple formula ensures your skin gets exactly what it needs for a healthier-looking complexion.

steps.caption: Cleanse skin first, dry, then apply a pea-sized amount onto the desired area and rub into the skin.
Allow to fully absorb before proceeding to the next step in your skin care routine.

feel_the_difference.title: Feel the difference or it’s free
feel_the_difference.desc: We put our money where our benefits are. That’s how much we believe in the power of redox. And if you’re not into it, that’s OK. More for us.

items.header: What makes ASEA® Intensive Redox Serum so special?
items.desc:
ASEA was the first company to replicate the body’s natural redox signaling molecules. ASEA Intensive Redox Serum harnesses the power of cell signaling redox technology in a light, fast-absorbing serum.

Redox molecules help with skin elasticity, firmness, and the appearance of cellulite. This concentrated formula works to visibly add smoothness, even texture, and revitalize healthy skin appearance.

items.header: Can I use ASEA® Intensive Redox Serum with other skin care lines?
items.desc: Yes. The formula is compatible with any skin care products you choose to use. We recommend pairing with our RENUAdvanced® system for best results.

items.header: Is ASEA® Intensive Redox Serum Halal Certified?
items.desc: Yes. This certification ensures the features and quality of products according to the rules established by the Islamic Council.

items.header: Does the ASEA® Intensive Redox Serum have retinol in its formula?
items.desc: No. Although retinol is a popular age-fighting ingredient, it can also cause skin irritation.

items.header: Does the ASEA® Intensive Redox Serum contain any fragrance?
items.desc: No. ASEA Intensive Redox Serum does not contain any fragrance.

items.header: How should I store ASEA® Intensive Redox Serum?
items.desc: Keep product out of direct sunlight and extreme temperatures. For best results, store in a cool, dry place.

items.header: Is ASEA® Intensive Redox Serum paraben-free?
items.desc: Yes, ASEA® Intensive Redox Serum is paraben-free! It is also free from GMOs, sulfates, animal-based ingredients, and artificial colors. Our skin care system has been clinically and dermatologist tested and is suitable for all skin types.

items.header: Is ASEA® Intensive Redox Serum vegan?
items.desc: Yes. ASEA® Intensive Redox Serum is produced without harming animals (cruelty-free) and doesn’t contain animal-based ingredients, animal by-products, or animal-derived products.

items.header: At what age should I start using ASEA® Intensive Redox Serum?
items.desc: At any age! We formulated it for anyone who wants to power their skin’s potential by taking care of their overall well-being, including those with dry or sensitive skin.
